metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8020 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in open-build-service allows remote attackers to store arbitrary JS code to cause XSS. This issue affects: openSUSE open-build-service versions prior to 7cc32c8e2ff7290698e101d9a80a9dc29a5500fb.

criterions.comment: open-build-service package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
